<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove User From Workspace"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/workspaces/{workspace_id}/users"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove a user from a workspace.

Args:
    email (str): The email address of the user to be removed
    workspace_id (str): The ID of the workspace.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workspace_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"Workspace Id"}},{"name":"email","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"Email"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
